text: You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters Message : * A friend wanted you to see this item from WRAL. com : http : / / wr. al / 1BERY People aren ’ t happy about Jenna Fischer ’ s new on - screen love interest. Fischer, you may recall, played Pam Beesly on the hit NBC show “ The Office, ” and one of the major storyline on the show centered around Pam's relationship with Jim Halpert ( John Krasinski ). The relationship began as a commonly seen will they / won ’ t they, until the two lovebirds got together. They eventually married and had two children in the fictional relationship.
